description: Gaining weight/fat, often used humorously about oneself after holidays.

examples.translation: Went home for Spring Festival and fattened up.

examples.chinese: 肉眼可见地变胖了,养膘过头了
examples.translation: Visibly got fatter, fattened up too much.

examples.chinese: 熬这几天都成养膘加烂脸了
examples.translation: Staying up late these days made me fat and ruined my skin.
